```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r read-in-data}
m1 <- read_csv("raw-data/master_m1.csv")
m2 <- read_csv("raw-data/master_m2.csv")
c1 <- read_csv("raw-data/master_c1.csv")
```

```{r cleaning-data}
m1 <- m1 |> 
  select(-c(longitude, latitude, mei)) |> 
  mutate(buoy_id = "M1") |> 
  mutate(year = format(time, "%Y"),
         month = format(time, "%m"),
         day = format(time, "%d"))

m2 <- m2 |> 
  select(-mei) |> 
  mutate(buoy_id = "M2")|> 
  mutate(year = format(time, "%Y"),
         month = format(time, "%m"),
         day = format(time, "%d"))

c1 <- c1 |>
  select(-mei) |> 
  mutate(buoy_id = "C1")|> 
  mutate(year = format(time, "%Y"),
         month = format(time, "%m"),
         day = format(time, "%d"))

all_sites <- bind_rows(m1, m2, c1)

all_sites <- all_sites |> 
  mutate(enso_event = case_when(year %in% c(2004,2005,2006,2009,2013,2014,2015,2017,2018,2019,2020)~ 
                              "Neutral", TRUE ~ enso_event))
```
